reviewText: A clear and concise overview for serving the M11.

Excellent step by step instructions and visuals - takes disassemby far beyond anything I would ever attempt, however.  For example, I would never take the bolt apart - he doesn't point out that a special tool.
bought it as gift for my purple heart grandson.

This is a must have for Garand owners who wants to take apart, clean and maintain it. I couldn't have taken it apart and reassembled it without this DVD, it shows the disassembling and reassembling of the rifle. I highly recomend.
It had a lot of info and easy to follow. Good DVD. I would recommend this to M1A newbies to learn
